title: Super restore (Last Man Standing)

properties.value: A super restore is a potion found in the Last Man Standing minigame that restores all player stats that have been lowered, including Prayer, but not including Hitpoints.

SMW Subobject for (1)High Alchemy value: 24Examine: 1 dose of super restore potion.Is members only: falseIs variant of: Super restore (Last Man Standing)Uses infobox: ItemImage: File:Super restore(1).pngWeight: 0.020Value: 40Version anchor: 1 doseRelease date: 11 July 2019Item ID: 23573

A super restore is a potion found in the Last Man Standing minigame that restores all player stats that have been lowered, including Prayer, but not including Hitpoints.

The restore value obtained per dose is 8 + 25% of the player's base level (round down) in each of the affected skills. For example, a player with 84 Thieving and 63 Smithing would restore both 29 points of Thieving and 23 points of Smithing for each dose consumed. The maximum amount of points that can be restored with this potion is 32 at level 96. This means that a super restore potion will restore 1 more Prayer point per dose than a prayer potion. Unlike normal super restores, these lack an "Empty" option.

Effects[edit | edit source]

Stat restore is calculated with: ⌊ L e v e l × 1 4 ⌋ + 8 {\displaystyle \lfloor Level\times {\frac {1}{4}}\rfloor +8}

Level Boost Level Boost Level Boost
1-3 +8 36-39 +17 72-75 +26
4-7 +9 40-43 +18 76-79 +27
8-11 +10 44-47 +19 80-83 +28
12-15 +11 48-51 +20 84-87 +29
16-19 +12 52-55 +21 88-91 +30
20-23 +13 56-59 +22 92-95 +31
24-27 +14 60-63 +23 96-99 +32
28-31 +15 64-67 +24
32-35 +16 68-71 +25

A '''super restore''' is a potion found in the [[Last Man Standing]] [[minigame]] that restores all player [[stats]] that have been lowered, including [[Prayer]], but not including [[Hitpoints]].

The restore value obtained per dose is 8 + 25% of the player's base level (round down) in each of the affected [[skills]]. For example, a player with 84 [[Thieving]] and 63 [[Smithing]] would restore both 29 points of Thieving and 23 points of Smithing for each dose consumed. The maximum amount of points that can be restored with this potion is 32 at level 96. This means that a super restore potion will restore 1 more Prayer point per dose than a [[prayer potion]]. Unlike normal [[super restore]]s, these lack an "Empty" option.

==Effects==
Stat restore is calculated with: <math>\lfloor Level \times \frac{1}{4} \rfloor + 8</math>
